title: Random Occurrence
description: The world is full of occurrences! "My shoe untied itself," or "a bird just pooped on me" are examples of these occurrences. There are people who have the power to summon these occurrences! The Random Occurrence can summon any random event in order to protect the life of its user. Randy Smith, an everyday office worker, wishes to end his own life, but unfortunately his ability, The Random Occurrence, won't let him. So join Randy on his journey to end his life!
author: timz_bad_lol
